description: I created this website about ASUS ProArt because at that time I was very confused about what to make, but finally I got inspiration from an ASUS sales book that contained a lot of information about introducing sophisticated laptops.
I was quite happy after I managed to create a To Do List application, yes indeed but it is not completely perfect.
I created this template website because I was really bored at that time, so I created and shared this website for free in my community.
I created this app for a school assignment, and since then I've been working on ways to make my program run better and I've made the UI cleaner and nicer with Tailwind CSS.
This is my first portfolio that is 100% finished. Although the design is not very attractive, it makes me proud.

I created this website because of a social science assignment, at that time I was told to create it using Canva, but I challenged myself to create it in the form of a website. On this website I explain about the geographical impact of the country of Indonesia.
